alert.note: Alert for Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 9:47PM CDT until August 13 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Sumner County in south central Kansas... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 946 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Caldwell, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Caldwell, South Haven, Geuda Springs, Hunnewell, and Perth. This includes Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 1 and 16. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
